name: Dracula Is Coming
description:
Count Dracula on the warpath. The best vampire hunters from around the world are going to kill that one. As it turns out, this is not so simple and easy. Take on these arrogant mercenaries and change history.

Dracula Is Coming is a shooter that will allow you to enjoy the blood of your enemies to your heart's content. Every step can be too dangerous. Complete all levels and be careful, aspen colas are everywhere. Using your skills and your reaction, make sure that evil finally triumphs!

Features of the game:
- Pixel-Art
- Nice musical accompaniment
- Many Levels
- Complexity
